caption.title: DPP-IV inhibitory activity of phytochemicals: (A) caffeine, (B) catechin, (C) epicatechin, (D) gallic acid, (E) isoquercitrin, (F) quercetin, (G) rutin and (H) the antidiabetic small molecule drug, nateglinide
caption.p: Values are mean Â± SEM with n=4, * P<0.05, ** P<0.01 and *** P< 0.001, compared with control.
